title: 1998–99 FA Vase
text:
The 1998–99 FA Vase was the 25th season of the <a href="FA%20Vase">FA Vase</a>, an annual <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition for teams in the lower reaches of the <a href="English%20football%20league%20system">English football league system</a>.
<a href="Tiverton%20Town%20F.C.">Tiverton Town</a> won the competition, beating <a href="Bedlington%20Terriers%20F.C.">Bedlington Terriers</a> in the final.
Semi-Finals.
"Tiverton Town won 5–1 on aggregate."
"Bedlington Terriers won 5–0 on aggregate."
